      • OutputGate

        public OutputGate(JobID jobId,
          GateID gateId,
          int index)
        Constructs a new output gate.
        Parameters:
        jobId - the ID of the job this input gate belongs to
        gateId - the ID of the gate
        index - the index assigned to this output gate at the Environment object

      • isClosed

        public boolean isClosed()
        Description copied from class: Gate
        Checks if the gate is closed. The gate is closed if all this associated channels are closed.
        Specified by:
        isClosed in class Gate<IOReadableWritable>
        Returns:

        Checks if the considered gate is an input gate.
        Specified by:
        isInputGate in class Gate<IOReadableWritable>
        Returns:
        true if the considered gate is an input gate, false if it is an output gate

        public void publishEvent(AbstractEvent event)
                  throws IOException,
                         InterruptedException
        Description copied from class: Gate
        Publishes an event.
        Specified by:
        publishEvent in class Gate<IOReadableWritable>
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be published
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if an error occurs while transmitting the event
        InterruptedException - thrown if the thread is interrupted while waiting for the event to be published

      • releaseAllChannelResources

        public void releaseAllChannelResources()
        Description copied from class: Gate
        Releases the allocated resources (particularly buffer) of all channels attached to this gate. This method should only be called after the respected task has stopped running.
        Specified by:
        releaseAllChannelResources in class Gate<IOReadableWritable>
